response.original_title: Sky Dancers: Spread Your Wings & Time And Again
response.overview: Spread Your Wings - A nagging injury makes Angelica decide to leave the Sky Dancers. Skyla sends her to the Plateau of Reflection to consider her decision. When Sky Clone learns Angelica is gone, he seizes the chance to attack the Wingdom! Now The Tinker must re-instill Angelica's confidence so she can return and help her friends battle Sky Clone. Otherwise the Sky Dancers may never drive him back to the Nether World!  Time And Again - The Sky Dancers are sucked into an old music box and transported to a time long ago in the Wingdom â€” when Skyla, Sky Clone and Skyler were teenagers! Here they learn the history of the Sky Realm and discover a terrible plot the young Sky Clone is hatching against Skyler. The Sky Dancers must find a way to protect Skyler from Sky Clone's evil plan and somehow get back to their own time!
response.title: Sky Dancers: Spread Your Wings & Time And Again
